mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_book (bookname, bookprice, bookauthor, booknum, typeid, pubid, bookpic) VALUES (#{bookname},#{bookprice},#{bookauthor},#{booknum},#{typeid},#{pubid},'')
mapper.select: select t_book.*,t_booktype.booktype AS 'booktype.booktype',t_publisher.pubname AS 'publisher.pubname',t_publisher.id AS 'publisher.id',t_booktype.id AS 'booktype.id' from t_book INNER JOIN t_publisher ON t_book.pubid = t_publisher.id INNER JOIN t_booktype ON t_book.typeid = t_booktype.id ORDER BY t_book.id DESC ;
